verbose_text: Statins are known to increase SREBP2 and miR-33-5p expression [XREF_BIBR], therefore, individuals taking statins will likely have consistently low levels of miR-33-5p target genes, including those involved in bile acid export, which may lead to increased hepatic cholesterol accumulation, a known side effect of statins.
evidence: Statins are known to increase SREBP2
